item.title: Leweb Paris 2012; a visual overview in iPad sketchnotes
item.description: An overview in visuals of the most important keynote speakers at Leweb 2012 Paris. These are live iPadsketches made while the speakers where on stage and tweeted and posted as soon as they where ready. Bundled in this overview to give ou a quick summary of LeWebs main stage during the 3 busy days of the conference.
item.content:encoded: An overview in visuals of the most important keynote speakers at Leweb 2012 Paris. item.title: Sharpen your point
item.description: Every slide has a point. Even the bad ones. If you don’t make one, people will assume one. So half the battle in building slide decks, (and creating compelling messages) is figuring out what the point really is. Here’s a slideshare that shows you how.
item.content:encoded: Every slide has a point. Even the bad ones. If you don’t make one, people will assume one. So half the battle in building slide decks, (and creating compelling messages) is figuring out what the point really is. Here’s a slideshare that shows you how.
item.author: powerfulpoint@slideshare.net(powerfulpoint)

media:content.media:description: Every slide has a point. Even the bad ones. If you don't make one, people will assume one. So half the battle in building slide decks, (and creating compelling messages) is figuring out what the point really is. Here's a slideshare that shows you how.

item.title: JWT: 10 Trends for 2013 - Executive Summary
item.description: In our eighth annual forecast of trends for the near future, new technology continues to take center stage. Many of our trends reflect how businesses are driving, leveraging or counteracting its omnipresence in our lives, and how consumers are responding to its pull. We also put a spotlight on health, with two separate trends examining the rising awareness around the impact of stress and happiness on well-being and how businesses are addressing it. As a companion to our full-report, we’ve created an Executive Summary presentation. To read more about JWT’s "10 Trends for 2013" or to purchase the report, visit JWTIntelligence.com.
item.content:encoded: In our eighth annual forecast of trends for the near future, new technology continues to take center stage. Many of our trends reflect how businesses are driving, leveraging or counteracting its omnipresence in our lives, and how consumers are responding to its pull. As a companion to our full-report, we’ve created an Executive Summary presentation. To read more about JWT’s "10 Trends for 2013" or to purchase the report, visit JWTIntelligence.com.

As a companion to our full-report, we've created an Executive Summary presentation.
To read more about JWT's "10 Trends for 2013" or to purchase the report, visit JWTIntelligence.com.

item.title: Responsive Web Design: Clever Tips and Techniques
item.description: Responsive Web design challenges Web designers to adapt a new mindset to their design and coding processes. This talk provides an overview of various practical techniques, tips and tricks that you might want to be aware of when working on a new responsive design project.
item.content:encoded: Responsive Web design challenges Web designers to adapt a new mindset to their design and coding processes. This talk provides an overview of various practical techniques, tips and tricks that you might want to be aware of when working on a new responsive design project.

item.title: Why My Buddy is Buying a Bus
item.description: My buddy Matt Madeiro is foregoing birthday and Christmas gifts to buy a bus. I tell why in this SlideShare! If you can’t click the link from inside the presentation, use this one: http://bit.ly/25BuysABus NOTE: Matt informed me that for the week Dec 3-7, all donations up to $5000 will be matched...so your $25 will actually be $50!!!

item.title: 21st Century Critical Literacy
item.description: Is traditional reading and writing enough to be considered literate in the 21st century? We need to rethink our notion of critical literacy, develop authentic learning and assessment opportunities, upgrade and amplify our curriculum.
item.content:encoded: Is traditional reading and writing enough to be considered literate in the 21st century? We need to rethink our notion of critical literacy, develop authentic learning and assessment opportunities, upgrade and amplify our curriculum.

item.title: Educating the ruling class at ses chicago 2012
item.description: This was a presentation I put on at SES Chicago helping spread the message that SEO and social for the sake of SEO and Social is pointless. It has to be part of something larger.

item.title: Gapingvoid: I'm Not Delusional, I'm An Entrepreneur
item.description: Gapingvoid’s unique style of visual communication has long been popular among successful and aspiring entrepreneurs. They decorate their offices with prints of gapingvoid art. They wear our t-shirts. They read our blog and newsletter. We admire and appreciate all entrepreneurs - they are the future - and we salute them (and you) with this short look at entrepreneurship told through a series of cartoons.
item.content:encoded: Gapingvoid’s unique style of visual communication has long been popular among successful and aspiring entrepreneurs. They decorate their offices with prints of gapingvoid art. They wear our t-shirts. They read our blog and newsletter. item.title: Who says startups are easy
item.description: Today with the increased competition and attention diffusion, it is becoming much harder to be a consumer web startups. And in order to win, the founders need to make all the right bets, all the time, or else they will find themselves on road to nowhere.
item.content:encoded: Today with the increased competition and attention diffusion, it is becoming much harder to be a consumer web startups. And in order to win, the founders need to make all the right bets, all the time, or else they will find themselves on road to nowhere.
